ygData.messageBody:
Ken Lee wrote:

>
> 2. I've looked all over Queynos for the doctrine of Wizardry and never found
> it. I have to take a trip to Erudin? That would be ridiculous.

Maybe but I did go to erudin for mine - also Freeport has them perhaps qeynos does to I never found em there
though.

>
> 3. I couldn't train in research past 1 pt. when I hit 16th, haven't trained
> since then. Does this mean we have to spend numerous pieces of plat to
> improve this skill?
>
> I too trained my first point at 16 and was refused further training at each new level at 19 I had the runes to
> fashion 2 spells ( 1 rune given 3 runes found - 2 in Lake Rathe ) I attempted first to make pillar of fire and
> blew my runes being told I did not have the skill to combine them - I spoke with a local wizard he suggested
> just bad luck - I put my next two runes into my lexicon hit combine - poof congratulations you have become
> better at resarch and have created something new - skill rose to 17 in one successfull attempt - further
> discussions with the wizard aforementioned reveals after succesfully making many runes his skill is up to 19 so
> dont expect that large increase to happen more than once - scribing project lightning a now happy wiz knows it
> works and can be done.

I would not spend any money training the skill further unless you rather spend to train and reduce the risk of
blowing up your runes - personally I am saving a few for specialization skill which as yet methinks
unimplemented.

Xzar level 19 wizard of Xegony
